foreignNames.name: 电震
foreignNames.text: 电震对目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害。

originalText: Shock deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

name: Shunt
text: Change the target of target spell with a single target.
flavor: Aranghil held her fury in her heart, hard and bright as a ruby. With its razor edge, she rewrote the laws of battle.

rulings.text: The target of a spell that targets another spell on the stack can be changed to any other spell on the stack, even if the new target will resolve before the spell does.
You can’t make a spell which is on the stack target itself.

You can choose to make a spell on the stack target this spell (if such a target choice would be legal had the spell been cast while this spell was on the stack). The new target for the deflected spell is not chosen until this spell resolves. This spell is still on the stack when new targets are selected for the spell.
Once the spell resolves, the new target is considered to be targeted by the deflected spell. This will trigger any effects which trigger on being targeted.
This does not check if the current target is legal. It just checks if the spell has a single target.
You choose the spell to target on announcement, but you pick the new target for that spell on resolution.
If there is no other legal target for the spell, this does not change the target.
This only targets the spell being changed, not the original or new target of the spell it is affecting.
If a spell targets multiple things, you can’t target it with Shunt, even if all but one of those targets has become illegal.
If a spell targets the same player or object multiple times, you can’t target it with Shunt.

foreignNames.name: Beiseiteschieben
foreignNames.text: Verändere das Ziel eines Zauberspruches deiner Wahl, der nur ein einzelnes Ziel hat.
foreignNames.flavor: Aranghil sammelte die Wut in ihrem Herzen, bis sie hart und leuchtend wie ein Rubin war. Mit ihr schrieb sie die Gesetze des Kampfes neu.

foreignNames.name: Desviar
foreignNames.text: Cambia el objetivo del hechizo objetivo que tenga un solo objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: Aranghil guardó su furia en su corazón, duro y brillante como un rubí. Con su filo, reescribió las leyes de la batalla.

foreignNames.name: Détournement
foreignNames.text: Remplacez la cible du sort ciblé qui a une cible unique.
foreignNames.flavor: « Parlez au diable, employez la magie, Vous ne détournerez nul être de sa fin. » Jean de la Fontaine, La souris métamorphosée en fille

foreignNames.name: Deviare
foreignNames.text: Cambia il bersaglio di una magia bersaglio che ha un singolo bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: Aranghil tratteneva in cuore la propria furia, dura e splendente come un rubino. Col suo lato affilato, riscrisse le leggi della battaglia.

foreignNames.name: 分流
foreignNames.text: 単一の対象を持つ呪文１つを対象とし、それの対象を変更する。
foreignNames.flavor: アランジルの心には、ルビーのように輝く堅固な怒りが満ちた。 その鋭い刃は、戦争の法則をも書き換えた。

foreignNames.name: Derivação
foreignNames.text: Altere o alvo da mágica alvo com um único alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: Aranghil reteve sua fúria em seu coração, duro e brilhante como um rubi. Com sua ponta cortante, ela reescreveu as leis da batalha.

foreignNames.name: Сдвиг
foreignNames.text: Измените цель целевого заклинания с единственной целью.
foreignNames.flavor: Арангил хранила свой гнев в сердце, твердом и ярком, словно рубин. Его острой как лезвие гранью она переписала законы боя.

foreignNames.name: 易辙
foreignNames.text: 为仅指定单一目标的目标咒语更改目标。
foreignNames.flavor: 阿朗喜将怒火藏在心中，坚硬明亮如红宝石。 她用此锐利锋芒改写战争法则。

originalText: Change the target of target spell with a single target.

name: Siege-Gang Commander
text:
When Siege-Gang Commander enters the battlefield, create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to any target.

rulings.text: You can sacrifice any Goblin you control to activate Siege-Gang Commander’s activated ability, not just the ones its triggered ability puts onto the battlefield. You can even sacrifice Siege-Gang Commander itself.

foreignNames.name: Belagerungstrupp-Kommandant
foreignNames.text:
Wenn der Belagerungstrupp-Kommandant ins Spiel kommt, bringe drei 1/1 rote Goblinkreaturspielsteine ins Spiel.
{1}{R}, opfere einen Goblin: Der Belagerungstrupp-Kommandant fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.

foreignNames.name: Comandante de sitiadores
foreignNames.text:
Cuando el Comandante de sitiadores entre en juego, pon en juego tres fichas de criatura Trasgo rojas 1/1.
{1}{R}, sacrificar un Trasgo: el Comandante de sitiadores hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.

foreignNames.name: Commandant des assiégeants
foreignNames.text:
Quand le Commandant des assiégeants arrive en jeu, mettez en jeu trois jetons de créature 1/1 rouge Gobelin.
{1}{R}, sacrifiez un gobelin : Le Commandant des assiégeants inflige 2 blessures à une cible, créature ou joueur.

foreignNames.text:
Quando il Capo della Squadra di Assedio entra in gioco, metti in gioco tre pedine creatura Goblin 1/1 rosse.
{1}{R}, Sacrifica un Goblin: Il Capo della Squadra di Assedio infligge 2 danni a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.

foreignNames.text:

{1}{R}, ゴブリンを１体生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。包囲攻撃の司令官はそれに２点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ゴブリン

foreignNames.name: Comandante do Grupo de Cerco
foreignNames.text:
Quando Comandante do Grupo de Cerco entrar em jogo, coloque em jogo três fichas de criatura vermelhas 1/1 do tipo Goblin.
{1}{R}, Sacrifique um Goblin: Comandante do Grupo de Cerco causa 2 pontos de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.

foreignNames.name: Командир Осадчиков
foreignNames.text:
Когда Командир Осадчиков входит в игру, положите в игру три фишки существа 1/1 красный Гоблин.
{1}{R}, Пожертвуйте Гоблина: Командир Осадчиков наносит 2 повреждения целевому существу или игроку.

foreignNames.name: 攻城指挥官
foreignNames.text:
当攻城指挥官进场时，将三个1/1红色精灵衍生物放置进场。
{1}{R}，牺牲一个精灵：攻城指挥官对目标生物或牌手造成2点伤害。

originalText:
When Siege-Gang Commander comes into play, put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens into play.
{1}{R}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Siege-Gang Commander deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

name: Smash
text:
Destroy target artifact.
Draw a card.
flavor: Ravnica's laws protect not its citizens but its industry. Aging equipment is destroyed rather than restored, to bring more money into the factories' coffers.

foreignNames.name: Schmetterschlag
foreignNames.text:
Zerstöre ein Artefakt deiner Wahl.
Ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Gesetze Ravnicas beschützen die Industrie, nicht die Bürger. Zu alte Ausrüstung wird zerstört statt aufbewahrt, um mehr Geld in die Kassen der Fabriken zu spülen.

foreignNames.name: Moler
foreignNames.text:
Destruye el artefacto objetivo.
Roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Las leyes de Rávnica no protegen a sus ciudadanos sino a su industria. El equipo envejecido se destruye en lugar de repararse, para llevar más dinero a las arcas de las industrias.

foreignNames.name: Cogne
foreignNames.text:
Détruisez l'artefact ciblé.
Piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: Les lois de Ravnica ne protègent pas ses citoyens, mais son industrie. L'équipement vétuste est détruit plutôt que restauré, pour apporter encore plus d'argent dans les coffres des usines.

foreignNames.name: Spaccare
foreignNames.text:
Distruggi un artefatto bersaglio.
Pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: Le leggi di Ravnica non proteggono i suoi cittadini ma le sue fabbriche. L'equipaggiamento meno recente viene distrutto invece di essere riparato, per portare più soldi nelle casse delle industrie.

foreignNames.name: スマッシュ
foreignNames.text:
アーティファクト１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。
カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.flavor: ラヴニカの法が守るのは、市民ではなく産業だ。 古くなった装具は修理せずに壊し、工場の金庫にさらに金を積み上げるのだ。

foreignNames.name: Esmagar
foreignNames.text:
Destrua o artefato alvo.
Compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: As leis de Ravnica não protegem seus cidadãos, mas sua indústria. Tudo o que é velho é destruído, em vez de restaurado, para trazer mais dinheiro para os cofres das fábricas.

foreignNames.name: Разгром
foreignNames.text:
Уничтожьте целевой артефакт.
Возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: Законы Равники защищают промышленность, а не жителей. Устаревшее оборудование чаще уничтожается, чем восстанавливается, чтобы принести больше денег в казну фабрик.

foreignNames.name: 破碎击
foreignNames.text:
消灭目标神器。
抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 拉尼卡的法律是用来保护工业，而不是保护市民。 老旧的武具均应销毁而不予修复，如此才能充实工厂的金库。

originalText:
Destroy target artifact.
Draw a card.

name: Soulblast
text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice all creatures you control.
Soulblast deals damage to any target equal to the total power of the sacrificed creatures.

foreignNames.name: Seelenexplosion
foreignNames.text:
Opfere alle Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, als zusätzliche Kosten, um Seelenexplosion zu spielen.
Die Seelenexplosion fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl Schadenspunkte in Höhe der zusammengezählten Stärke der geopferten Kreaturen zu.

foreignNames.name: Ráfaga de almas
foreignNames.text:

La Ráfaga de almas hace una cantidad de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo igual a la fuerza total de las criaturas sacrificadas.

foreignNames.name: Salve d'âmes
foreignNames.text:

La Salve d'âmes inflige à une cible, créature ou joueur, un nombre de blessures égal à la force totale des créatures sacrifiées.

foreignNames.name: Esplosione dell'Anima
foreignNames.text:

L'Esplosione dell'Anima infligge danno a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio pari alla forza totale delle creature sacrificate.

foreignNames.name: 心魂破
foreignNames.text:

クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。心魂破はそれに、その生け贄に捧げたクリーチャーのパワーの合計に等しい点数のダメージを与える。

foreignNames.name: Explosão da Alma
foreignNames.text:
Como custo adicional para jogar Explosão da Alma, sacrifique todas as criaturas que você controla.
Explosão da Alma causa uma quantidade de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo igual à soma do poder das criaturas sacrificadas.

foreignNames.name: Порыв Души
foreignNames.text:
В качестве дополнительной стоимости разыгрывания Порыва Души, пожертвуйте все существа под вашим контролем.
Порыв Души наносит целевому существу или игроку количество повреждений, равное общей силе пожертвованных существ.

foreignNames.name: 灵魂冲击
foreignNames.text:
牺牲所有由你操控的生物，以作为使用灵魂冲击的额外费用。
灵魂冲击对目标生物或牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于所牺牲之生物的力量总和。

originalText:
As an additional cost to play Soulblast, sacrifice all creatures you control.
Soulblast deals damage to target creature or player equal to the total power of the sacrificed creatures.

name: Spark Elemental
text:
Trample, haste (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking. This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental.

foreignNames.name: Funkenelementar
foreignNames.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden, Eile (Falls diese Kreatur ihren Blockern genug Schaden zufügen würde, um sie zu zerstören, kannst du sie den Rest des Schadens dem verteidigenden Spieler zufügen lassen. Diese Kreatur kann angreifen und {T}, sobald sie unter deine Kontrolle kommt.)
Opfere das Funkenelementar am Ende des Zuges.
foreignNames.flavor: Vulshokschamanen schafften es nicht, sie länger als ein paar Sekunden am Leben zu erhalten, aber diese wenigen Momente reichten meistens aus.

foreignNames.name: Elemental de chispas
foreignNames.text:
Arrolla, prisa. (Si esta criatura fuera a hacer suficiente daño de combate a sus bloqueadores como para destruirlos, puedes hacer que le haga el resto del daño al jugador defensor. Esta criatura puede atacar y {T} tan pronto como entre bajo tu control.)
Al final del turno, sacrifica el Elemental de chispas.
foreignNames.flavor: Los chamanes vúlshok nunca pudieron mantenerlos vivos por más que unos segundos, pero esos segundos parecían ser suficiente.

foreignNames.name: Élémental d'étincelles
foreignNames.text:
Piétinement, célérité (Si cette créature inflige suffisamment de blessures de combat à ses bloqueurs pour les détruire, vous pouvez faire qu'elle inflige le reste de ses blessures au joueur défenseur. Cette créature peut attaquer et {T} dès le tour où elle arrive sous votre contrôle.)
À la fin du tour, sacrifiez l'Élémental d'étincelles.
foreignNames.flavor: Les shamanes vulshoks ne pouvaient pas les maintenir en vie plus de quelques secondes, mais cela semblait toujours suffire.

foreignNames.name: Elementale Scintillante
foreignNames.text:
Travolgere, rapidità (Se questa creatura sta per infliggere alle sue creature bloccanti danno da combattimento sufficiente a distruggerle, puoi farle infliggere il resto del suo danno al giocatore in difesa. Questa creatura può attaccare e {T} non appena entra sotto il tuo controllo.)
Alla fine del turno, sacrifica l'Elementale Scintillante.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli sciamani Vulshok non riuscivano mai a tenerli in vita per più di qualche secondo, ma quei pochi secondi sembravano sufficienti.

foreignNames.name: 火花の精霊
foreignNames.text:
トランプル、速攻 （このクリーチャーが、自身をブロックしているすべてのクリーチャーを破壊するのに十分な戦闘ダメージを与える場合、あなたはそれの残りのダメージを防御プレイヤーに与えてもよい。 このクリーチャーは、あなたのコントロール下になってすぐに攻撃したり{T}能力を使ったりできる。）
ターン終了時に、火花の精霊を生け贄に捧げる。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エレメンタル
foreignNames.flavor: ヴァルショクのシャーマンでも、それを数秒以上生かしておくことはできない。が、その数秒で十分のようだ。

foreignNames.name: Elemental das Centelhas
foreignNames.text:
Atropelar, ímpeto (Se esta criatura fosse causar dano de combate suficiente para destruir seus bloqueadores, você pode fazer com que ela cause o resto de seu dano ao jogador defensor.) Esta criatura pode atacar e {T} assim que entra sob seu controle.)
No final do turno, sacrifique Elemental das Centelhas.
foreignNames.flavor: Os xamãs vulshoques nunca conseguiam mantê-los vivos por mais de alguns segundos, mas ainda assim aqueles poucos segundos pareceram ser suficientes.

foreignNames.name: Искра-Элементаль
foreignNames.text:
Пробивной удар, Ускорение (Если это существо нанесло достаточно боевых повреждений, чтобы уничтожить блокирующие его существа, вы можете нанести оставшиеся повреждения защищающемуся игроку. Это существо может атаковать и {T}, как только оно попадает под ваш контроль.)
В конце хода пожертвуйте Искра-Элементаля.
foreignNames.flavor: Шаманы вулшоков никак не могли сохранить в них жизнь более чем на несколько секунд, но и этого ничтожного времени было предостаточно.

foreignNames.name: 星火元素
foreignNames.text:
践踏，敏捷（若此生物将造成的战斗伤害足以消灭所有阻挡它的生物，你可以使它对防御牌手造成所剩余数量的伤害。 此生物受你操控时便能攻击与{T}。）
在回合结束时，牺牲星火元素。
foreignNames.flavor: 瓦许克祭师只有本领让他们活上几秒钟，但这几秒便已足够。

originalText:
Trample, haste (If this creature would deal enough combat damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player. This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At end of turn, sacrifice Spark Elemental.

name: Spark Elemental
text:
Trample, haste (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking. This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Spark Elemental.
flavor: Vulshok shamans could never keep them alive for more than a few seconds, yet those few seconds seemed to be enough.

name: Spitting Earth
text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.
flavor:
"Within each of you is the strength of a landslide."
—Kumano, to his pupils

foreignNames.name: Kochende Erde
foreignNames.text: Kochende Erde fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl Schadenspunkte in Höhe der Anzahl der Gebirge, die du kontrollierst, zu.
foreignNames.flavor: „In jedem von euch steckt die Gewalt eines Erdrutsches." —Kumano zu seinen Schülern

foreignNames.name: Sacudida telúrica
foreignNames.text: La Sacudida telúrica hace una cantidad de daño igual al número de montañas que controles a la criatura objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: "Dentro de cada uno de ustedes está la fuerza de una avalancha." —Kumano, a sus alumnos

foreignNames.name: Expectoration tellurique
foreignNames.text: L'Expectoration tellurique inflige à la créature ciblée un nombre de blessures égal au nombre de montagnes que vous contrôlez.
foreignNames.flavor: « En chacun de vous réside la force d'un glissement de terrain. » —Kumano, à ses élèves

foreignNames.name: Fulmine Tellurico
foreignNames.text: Il Fulmine Tellurico infligge danno a una creatura bersaglio pari al numero di Montagne che controlli.
foreignNames.flavor: "Ognuno di voi ha dentro la forza di una frana." —Kumano, ai suoi allievi

foreignNames.name: 大地の飛礫
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。大地の飛礫はそれに、あなたがコントロールする山の総数に等しい点数のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 各々の中に山崩れの力有り。 ――熊野から学徒へ。

foreignNames.name: Golfada de Terra
foreignNames.text: Golfada de Terra causa à criatura alvo uma quantidade de dano igual ao número de Montanhas que você controla.
foreignNames.flavor: "Dentro de cada um de vocês está o poder de um deslizamento de terra." — Kumano, a seus alunos

foreignNames.name: Земляные Всплески
foreignNames.text: Земляные Всплески наносят целевому существу повреждения, равные количеству Гор под вашим контролем.
foreignNames.flavor: "В каждом из вас скрыта сила оползня". — Обращение Кумано к своим ученикам

foreignNames.name: 飞砾走石
foreignNames.text: 飞砾走石对目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于由你操控的山脉数量。
foreignNames.flavor: 「你们每人都拥有山崩般的潜力。」 ～熊野勉励弟子

originalText: Spitting Earth deals damage equal to the number of Mountains you control to target creature.

name: Squee, Goblin Nabob
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return Squee, Goblin Nabob from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor:
"Some goblins are expendable. Some are impossible to get rid of. But he's both—at the same time!"
—Starke

rulings.text: If Squee isn’t in your graveyard as your upkeep begins, its ability won’t trigger. You can’t take any actions during your turn before your upkeep begins.

foreignNames.name: Squee, Goblin-Nabob
foreignNames.text: Du kannst zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments Squee, Goblin-Nabob aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurückbringen.
foreignNames.flavor: „Einige Goblins sind entbehrlich. Manche kann man einfach nicht loswerden. Aber für ihn gilt beides — gleichzeitig" —Starke

foreignNames.name: Squee, trasgo nabab
foreignNames.text: Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, puedes regresar a Squee, trasgo nabab de tu cementerio a tu mano.
foreignNames.flavor: "Algunos trasgos son sacrificables. Algunos es imposible librarse de ellos. Pero él es ambas cosas, ¡al mismo tiempo" —Starke

foreignNames.name: Skwi, nabab gobelin
foreignNames.text: Au début de votre entretien, vous pouvez renvoyer Skwi, nabab gobelin depuis votre cimetière dans votre main.
foreignNames.flavor: « Certains gobelins sont sacrifiables. D'autres, on ne parvient pas à s'en débarrasser. Lui, c'est les deux à la fois » —Starke

foreignNames.name: Squee, Nababbo Goblin
foreignNames.text: All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, puoi riprendere in mano Squee, Nababbo Goblin dal tuo cimitero.
foreignNames.flavor: "Alcuni goblin sono sacrificabili. Alcuni sono impossibili da eliminare. Ma lui è entrambe le cose. . . allo stesso tempo" —Starke

foreignNames.name: ゴブリンの太守スクイー
foreignNames.text: あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたはあなたの墓地にあるゴブリンの太守スクイーをあなたの手札に戻してもよい。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — ゴブリン
foreignNames.flavor: 消耗品のゴブリンもいる。 追い出せないゴブリンもいる。 でも、こいつは両方だ――しかも同時にだ！ ――スターク

foreignNames.name: Squee, Nabobo Goblin
foreignNames.text: No início de sua manutenção, você pode devolver Squee, Nabobo Goblin de seu cemitério para sua mão.
foreignNames.flavor: "Alguns goblins são descartáveis. De outros é impossível se livrar. Mas ele é as duas coisas ao mesmo tempo" — Starke

foreignNames.name: Скви, Гоблин-Набоб

foreignNames.flavor: "Некоторых гоблинов можно использовать и забыть. От некоторых, наоборот, невозможно избавиться. Этот же и то, и другое, в одном лице" — Старк

foreignNames.name: 精灵总督斯奎

text:
Target creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor:

rulings.text: Must be used before blockers are declared in order to affect blocking decisions. You can’t wait to see what your opponent declares and then try to stop them.
You can use it after combat or even on a creature which can’t possibly block this turn because it’s that player’s turn to attack, but it generally has no effect other than to let you draw a card.

name: Sudden Impact

flavor:
"Some say it's better to think before you act. While those people are considering all the options, that's usually when I kill them."

foreignNames.flavor: „Es gibt Leute, die sagen, man soll denken, bevor man handelt. Und während diese Leute alle Möglichkeiten bedenken, habe ich genug Zeit, sie zu töten." —Dravus, Lavamagier

name: Warp World
text: Each player shuffles all permanents they own into their library, then reveals that many cards from the top of their library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of their library.

rulings.text: Anything that triggers during the resolution of this will wait to be put on the stack until everything is put onto the battlefield and resolution is complete. The player whose turn it is will put all of their triggered abilities on the stack in any order, then each other player in turn order will do the same. (The last ability put on the stack will be the first one that resolves.)

Taking it slowly, here's what happens when Warp World resolves: 1) Each player counts the number of permanents they own. 2) Each player shuffles those permanents into their library. 3) Each player reveals cards from the top of their library equal to the number that player counted. 4) Each player puts all artifact, land, and creature cards revealed this way onto the battlefield. All of these cards enter the battlefield at the same time. 5) Each player puts all enchantment cards revealed this way onto the battlefield. An Aura put onto the battlefield this way can enchant an artifact, land, or creature that was already put onto the battlefield, but can't enchant an enchantment that's being put onto the battlefield at the same time as it. If multiple players have Auras to put onto the battlefield, the player whose turn it is announces what their Auras will enchant, then each other player in turn order does the same, then all enchantments (both Auras and non-Auras) enter the battlefield at the same time. 6) Each player puts all of their other revealed cards (instants, sorceries, planeswalkers, and Auras that can't enchant anything) on the bottom of their library in any order.

Tokens are permanents but not cards. They’ll count toward the number of permanents shuffled into your library, so you’ll get a card back for each token you owned. But the tokens themselves should be ignored while you’re revealing *cards* from your library. In practice, you shouldn’t actually shuffle them into your library since they’ll cease to exist as soon as Warp World finishes resolving. Note that a token’s owner is the player under whose control it first entered the battlefield.

If a permanent leaves the battlefield this way but ends up in a zone other than a library (most likely because it’s a player’s commander in the Commander variant), it’s still counted to determine how many cards to reveal.

originalText: Each player shuffles all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then reveals that many cards from the top of his or her library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way into play, then puts all enchantment cards revealed this way into play, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put into play on the bottom of his or her library in any order.

name: Abundance
text: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

rulings.text: This replacement effect replaces the draw, so nothing that triggers on a draw will trigger.

If you use this on a multi-card draw, each replaced draw is handled separately. In other words, you reveal and then put on the bottom of the library for the first card, then do the same for the second, and so on. In a multi-card draw you do not have to choose how many of those draws will be replaced before you do any drawing or use of this card.
If no card of the chosen type is found before your library empties, you don’t get a card, but you do get to order all the cards in your library any way you choose.

If your library is empty, Abundance can prevent you from losing the game for being unable to draw a card. If an effect or turn-based action would cause you to draw a card, you can replace that draw with Abundance’s replacement effect. (It doesn’t matter that you’d be unable to actually draw a card.) Since Abundance’s effect has you put a card into your hand instead of drawing a card, you’ll never be forced to draw a card with an empty library.

name: Craw Wurm
flavor: The most terrifying thing about the craw wurm is probably the horrible crashing sound it makes as it speeds through the forest. This noise is so loud it echoes through the trees and seems to come from all directions at once.

foreignNames.name: Tatzelwurm
foreignNames.flavor: Das Schrecklichste am Tatzelwurm ist das furchtbar krachende Geräusch, mit dem er durch den Wald bricht. Der Lärm ist so laut, dass sein Echo von den Bäumen zurückgeworfen wird und von überall gleichzeitig zu kommen scheint.

foreignNames.name: Sierpe dragón
foreignNames.flavor: Lo más espeluznante de la sierpe dragón es probablemente el horrible estrépito que hace al moverse velozmente a través del bosque. Este ruido es tan fuerte que hace eco a través de los árboles y parece venir de todas direcciones al mismo tiempo.

foreignNames.name: Guivre vorace
foreignNames.flavor: Le plus terrifiant, ce sont les sinistres craquements de la guivre vorace qui chasse dans la forêt. Ils se répercutent dans les arbres et semblent venir de partout à la fois.

foreignNames.name: Wurm Devastatore
foreignNames.flavor: La cosa più terrificante del wurm devastatore sono probabilmente i terribili schianti che produce quando si muove rapidamente nella foresta. Il rumore è così forte che riecheggia tra gli alberi e sembra venire da tutte le direzioni contemporaneamente.

foreignNames.name: 大喰らいのワーム
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ワーム
foreignNames.flavor: このワームのいちばんの恐ろしさは、木々を砕いて森を進むときのすさまじい音にある。 その音は木々の間で激しくこだまし、まるで自分がその中心にいるような錯覚を起こさせるのだ。

foreignNames.name: Serpente Terrestre de Craw
foreignNames.flavor: Provavelmente, o que há de mais aterrador na serpente terrestre de craw é o horrível som de devastação que ela faz ao passar velozmente pela floresta. É um som tão alto que ecoa pelas árvores e parece vir de todos os lados.

foreignNames.name: Зобатый Вурм
foreignNames.flavor: Самое ужасное это то, с каким страшным шумом зобатый вурм продирается через лес. Шум отражается эхом меж деревьев, и кажется, что он звучит сразу со всех сторон.

foreignNames.name: 巨爪亚龙

foreignNames.name: Гигантский Паук
foreignNames.text: Захват (Это существо может блокировать существа с Полетом.)
foreignNames.flavor: "Когда я была ученицей Мултани, он заставлял меня часами сидеть и наблюдать за явимайскими пауками. У них я научилась скрытности, терпению и лучшему способу ловить ветряных дрейков". — Мирри с Везерлайта

foreignNames.name: 巨型蜘蛛
foreignNames.text: 延势（此生物能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。）
foreignNames.flavor: 「我在穆塔尼那边受训时，他要我坐下来观察亚维马雅的蜘蛛，一次要好几个小时。 我从他们身上学到了匿踪，耐心，以及网下风龙兽的最好方法。」 ～晴空号的米丽

originalText: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

name: Giant Spider
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor:
"When I trained under Multani, he bade me sit for hours watching Yavimaya's spiders. From them I learned stealth, patience, and the best way to snare a wind drake."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

rulings.text: This card now uses the Reach keyword ability to enable the blocking of flying creatures. This works because a creature with flying can only be blocked by creatures with flying or reach.

name: Grizzly Bears
flavor:
"We cannot forget that among all of Dominaria's wonders, a system of life exists, with prey and predators that will never fight wars nor vie for ancient power."
—Jolrael, empress of beasts

foreignNames.name: Grizzlybären
foreignNames.flavor: „Wir dürfen nie vergessen, dass es in Dominaria zwischen den ganzen Wundern auch einen Lebenskreislauf mit Raubtieren und Beutetieren gibt, die niemals Kriege austragen oder nach uraltem Wissen streben werden." —Jolrael, Herrin der Tiere

foreignNames.name: Osos pardos
foreignNames.flavor: "No podemos olvidar que entre todas las maravillas de Dominaria, existe un sistema de vida, con depredadores y presas que nunca lucharán en guerras ni desearán poderes antiguos." —Jolrael, emperatriz de bestias

foreignNames.name: Grizzlis
foreignNames.flavor: « Parmi les merveilles de Dominaria, il existe un cycle de vie, avec des proies et des prédateurs qui jamais ne feront la guerre ou ne chercheront à acquérir le pouvoir. Alors, ne touchez pas aux grizzlis. » —Jolrael, impératrice des bêtes

foreignNames.name: Orso Grizzly
foreignNames.flavor: "Non possiamo dimenticare che, tra tutte le meraviglie di Dominaria, esiste un ecosistema, con prede e predatori che non combatteranno mai guerre né si contenderanno antichi poteri." —Jolrael, imperatrice delle bestie

foreignNames.name: 灰色熊
foreignNames.flavor: ドミナリアのあらゆる不思議の中で、生命の仕組みこそ忘れることはできないものだ。弱肉強食の関係が覆されることもなく、古来の力に抗うこともないのだから。 ――獣たちの女帝ジョルレイル

foreignNames.name: Ursos Cinzentos
foreignNames.flavor: "Não podemos nos esquecer que, dentre todas as maravilhas de Dominária, existe um sistema de vida, com presas e predadores que nunca entrarão em guerras, nem competirão por poderes antigos." — Jolrael, imperatriz das criaturas

foreignNames.name: Гризли
foreignNames.flavor: "Мы не должны забывать, что среди всех чудес Доминарии существует система жизни с хищниками и добычей, которые никогда не будут воевать, ни соперничать за древнюю власть". — Джолрейл, повелительница зверей

foreignNames.name: 灰棕熊
foreignNames.flavor: 「千万别忘记了，在多明纳里亚诸般神奇之中，有个生命的系统存在着；里面包括了猎物与猎者，彼此不会争战或是抢夺远古力量。」 ～百兽女皇裘蕾尔

name: Hunted Wumpus
text: When Hunted Wumpus enters the battlefield, each other player may put a creature card from their hand onto the battlefield.
flavor: Just one can feed a dozen people for a month.

foreignNames.name: Gejagter Wumpus
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Gejagte Wumpus ins Spiel kommt, kann jeder andere Spieler eine Kreaturenkarte aus seiner Hand ins Spiel bringen.
foreignNames.flavor: Einer alleine kann schon ein Dutzend Leute für einen Monat ernähren.

foreignNames.name: Wumpus perseguido
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Wumpus perseguido entre en juego, cada uno de los demás jugadores puede poner en juego una carta de criatura de su mano.
foreignNames.flavor: Uno solo alimenta a una docena de personas durante un mes.

foreignNames.name: Wumpus au rabais
foreignNames.text: Quand le Wumpus au rabais arrive en jeu, chaque autre joueur peut mettre en jeu une carte de créature de sa main.
foreignNames.flavor: Il en suffit d'un pour nourrir une dizaine de personnes pendant un mois.

foreignNames.name: Wumpus Braccato
foreignNames.text: Quando il Wumpus Braccato entra in gioco, ogni altro giocatore può mettere in gioco una carta creatura dalla propria mano.
foreignNames.flavor: Un solo esemplare può saziare una dozzina di persone per un mese.

foreignNames.name: 狩り立てられたウンパス
foreignNames.text: 狩り立てられたウンパスが場に出たとき、他の各プレイヤーは、自分の手札からクリーチャー・カードを１枚、場に出してもよい。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — ビースト
foreignNames.flavor: 一匹獲れば、十二人もの人間の一ヶ月分の食料になるんだ。

foreignNames.name: Wumpus Caçado
foreignNames.text: Quando Wumpus Caçado entra em jogo, cada um dos outros jogadores pode colocar em jogo um card de criatura de sua própria mão.
foreignNames.flavor: Um desses é capaz de alimentar uma dúzia de pessoas durante um mês.

foreignNames.name: Загнанный Вумпус
foreignNames.text: Когда Загнанный Вумпус входит в игру, каждый другой игрок может положить в игру одну карту существа из своей руки.
foreignNames.flavor: Одним вумпусом может в течение месяца питаться десяток людей.

foreignNames.name: 捕获的狮头象
foreignNames.text: 当捕获的狮头象进场时，其它每位牌手都可以从其手上将一张生物牌放置进场。
foreignNames.flavor: 只要一头就能让一打人整个月不饿肚子。

originalText: When Hunted Wumpus comes into play, each other player may put a creature card from his or her hand into play.

name: Hurricane
text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.
flavor:
"Don't envy the grandeur of drakes. Their impression of grace fades when the first gust sends them crashing into one another."
—Molimo, maro-sorcerer

rulings.text: Whether or not a creature has flying is only checked on resolution.

foreignNames.name: Hurrikan
foreignNames.text: Der Hurrikan fügt allen fliegenden Kreaturen und allen Spielern X Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Sceadas muss man nicht um ihre Herrlichkeit beneiden. Dass ihre Anmut beim Fliegen nur oberflächlich ist, erkennt man sofort, wenn bereits ein kleiner Windstoß sie kollidieren lässt." —Molimo, Maro-Hexer

foreignNames.name: Huracán
foreignNames.text: El Huracán hace X puntos de daño a cada criatura que tenga la habilidad de volar y a cada jugador.
foreignNames.flavor: "No envidies la grandeza de los dracos. Esa falsa gracia se evapora cuando la primera ráfaga los hace chocar unos con otros." —Molimo, hechicero maro

foreignNames.name: Ouragan
foreignNames.text: L'Ouragan inflige X blessures à chaque créature avec le vol et à chaque joueur.
foreignNames.flavor: « Ne jalousez pas la majesté des drakôns. Leur apparente grâce disparaît quand la première rafale les projette les uns sur les autres. » —Molimo, maro-sorcier

foreignNames.name: Uragano
foreignNames.text: L'Uragano infligge X danni a ogni creatura con volare e a ogni giocatore.
foreignNames.flavor: "Non invidiare la magnificenza dei draghetti. La loro impressione di grazia svanisce quando la prima raffica di vento li fa sbattere uno contro l'altro." —Molimo, stregone maro

foreignNames.name: ハリケーン
foreignNames.text: ハリケーンは飛行を持つ各クリーチャーと各プレイヤーに、それぞれＸ点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: ドレイクの壮大さをうらやんではいけない。 あの優雅さなど、突風で互いにぶつかり合うようになれば消し飛んでしまうものなのだから。 ――マローの魔術師モリモ

foreignNames.name: Furacão
foreignNames.text: Furacão causa X pontos de dano a cada criatura com a habilidade de voar e a cada jogador.
foreignNames.flavor: "Não inveje o esplendor dos dragonetes. Sua graça inicial desaparece no momento em que a primeira rajada de vento os faz colidir uns contra os outros." — Molimo, feiticeiro maro

foreignNames.name: Ураган
foreignNames.text: Ураган наносит X повреждений каждому существу с Полетом и каждому игроку.
foreignNames.flavor: "Не завидуй величавости дрейков. Они становятся куда менее грациозными, когда первый же порыв сносит их, заставляя врезаться друг в друга". — Молимо, маро-волшебник

foreignNames.name: 飓风
foreignNames.text: 飓风对每个具飞行异能的生物与每位牌手造成X点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「不需羡慕龙兽之美。 等到第一阵狂风把他们吹得跌跌撞撞，那优雅形象马上就要破灭。」 ～玛洛术士莫黎墨

originalText: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

name: Joiner Adept
text: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
flavor: A talented apprentice makes all things. The master makes all things possible.

rulings.text: Each land you control gets this ability.

foreignNames.name: Meisterschreiner
foreignNames.text: Länder, die du kontrollierst, haben „{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe."
foreignNames.flavor: Ein talentierter Lehrling macht alle möglichen Dinge. Der Meister macht alle Dinge möglich.

foreignNames.name: Unificadora experta
foreignNames.text: Las tierras que controlas tienen "{T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná."
foreignNames.flavor: Una aprendiz con talento hace muchas cosas. Una maestra hace posible muchas cosas.

foreignNames.name: Experte menuisière
foreignNames.text: Les terrains que vous contrôlez ont « {T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve. »
foreignNames.flavor: L'apprenti talentueux fabrique beaucoup de choses. C'est son maître qui les rend possibles.

foreignNames.name: Adepta Giuntatrice
foreignNames.text: Le terre che controlli hanno "{T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana."
foreignNames.flavor: Un apprendista talentuoso crea ogni cosa. Il maestro rende ogni cosa possibile.

foreignNames.name: 社交の達人
foreignNames.text: あなたがコントロールする土地は「{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに、好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。」の能力を持つ。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エルフ・ドルイド
foreignNames.flavor: 才能ある弟子はあらゆる物を作り上げる。 その師はあらゆる物を可能にする。

foreignNames.name: Adepto da Junção
foreignNames.text: Os terrenos que você controla têm "{T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana."
foreignNames.flavor: Um aprendiz talentoso consegue fazer tudo. O mestre consegue fazer com que tudo seja possível.

foreignNames.name: Адепт Замыкания
foreignNames.text: Земли под вашим конролем имеют способность "{T}: Добавьте одну ману любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны".
foreignNames.flavor: Талантливый ученик делает все. Мастер же делает все возможным.

foreignNames.name: 联能专家
foreignNames.text: 由你操控的地具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」
foreignNames.flavor: 有天份的学徒能造出各种东西。 大师则让各种东西都造得出来。

originalText: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

name: Karplusan Strider
text: Karplusan Strider can't be the target of blue or black spells.
flavor: The strider's long, loping gait is an adaptation that allows it to move quickly in deep snow.

foreignNames.name: Karplusanischer Wanderer
foreignNames.text: Der Karplusanische Wanderer kann nicht das Ziel von blauen oder schwarzen Zaubersprüchen sein.
foreignNames.flavor: Die langen, hüpfenden Schritte des Wanderers sind eine Anpassung, die es ihm erlaubt, sich im tiefen Schnee schnell zu bewegen.

foreignNames.name: Montaraz karplusano
foreignNames.text: El Montaraz karplusano no puede ser objetivo de hechizos azules o negros.
foreignNames.flavor: La marcha de pasos largos del montaraz es una adaptación que le permite moverse rápidamente en la nieve profunda.

foreignNames.name: Enjambeur karpluséan
foreignNames.text: L'Enjambeur karpluséan ne peut pas être la cible de sorts bleus ou noirs.
foreignNames.flavor: L'étrange et longue démarche de l'enjambeur est une adaptation qui lui permet d'avancer rapidement dans la neige.

foreignNames.name: Ramingo di Karplusan
foreignNames.text: Il Ramingo di Karplusan non può essere bersaglio di magie blu o nere.
foreignNames.flavor: Il passo lungo e cadenzato del ramingo gli permette di muoversi velocemente anche nella neve più profonda.

foreignNames.name: カープルーザンの徘徊者
foreignNames.text: カープルーザンの徘徊者は青や黒の呪文の対象にならない。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — イエティ
foreignNames.flavor: 徘徊者の長く大またな足取りは、深雪の中を素早く動けるよう適応したものだ。

foreignNames.name: Andarilho Karplusano
foreignNames.text: Andarilho Karplusano não pode ser alvo de mágicas azuis ou pretas.
foreignNames.flavor: A andadura longa e galopante do andarilho é uma adaptação que o permite mover-se rapidamente na neve profunda.

foreignNames.name: Карплюсанский Бродяжник
foreignNames.text: Карплюсанский Бродяжник не может быть целью синих или черных заклинаний.
foreignNames.flavor: Размашистый, широкий шаг бродяжника позволяет ему быстрее передвигаться по глубокому снегу.

foreignNames.name: 卡普路桑神行客
foreignNames.text: 卡普路桑神行客不能成为蓝色或黑色咒语的目标。
foreignNames.flavor: 神行客长而远的步伐，是为适应厚重积雪，以便快速行动。

originalText: Karplusan Strider can't be the target of blue or black spells.

name: Kavu Climber
text: When Kavu Climber enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor:
"There was a crack of branches, a rustle of leaves, then a tremendous roar. Our party had no chance as death descended from above."
—Taseen, elvish bard

foreignNames.name: Kletterkavu
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Kletterkavu ins Spiel kommt, ziehe eine Karte.
foreignNames.flavor: „Zweige zerbrachen, Blätter raschelten, dann ließ ein Brüllen alles erzittern. Unsere Gruppe hatte keine Chance, als der Tod von oben kam." —Taseen, Elfenbarde

foreignNames.name: Kavu escalador
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Kavu escalador entre en juego, roba una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Hubo un crujir de ramas, un ruido de hojas y un tremendo rugido. Nuestro grupo no tuvo ninguna oportunidad cuando la muerte descendió sobre nosotros." —Taseen, bardo élfico

foreignNames.name: Kavru grimpeur
foreignNames.text: Quand le Kavru grimpeur arrive en jeu, piochez une carte.
foreignNames.flavor: « Il y eu un craquement de branches, un bruissement de feuilles, puis un terrible rugissement. La mort tomba sans prévenir sur notre groupe. » —Taseen, barde elfe

foreignNames.name: Scalatore Kavu
foreignNames.text: Quando lo Scalatore Kavu entra in gioco, pesca una carta.
foreignNames.flavor: "Udimmo il rumore di rami spezzati, un fruscio di foglie e poi un tremendo ruggito. Il nostro gruppo non aveva speranze mentre la morte piombava dall'alto." —Taseen, bardo elfico

foreignNames.name: 木登りカヴー
foreignNames.text: 木登りカヴーが場に出たとき、カードを１枚引く。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — カヴー
foreignNames.flavor: 枝の折れる音や葉の擦れる音がして、その直後にすさまじいうなり声が上がったんだ。 私の仲間は、上から降ってきた死を逃れる術すら無かったよ。 ――エルフの吟遊詩人、タシーン

foreignNames.name: Escalador Kavu
foreignNames.text: Quando Escalador Kavu entrar em jogo, compre um card.
foreignNames.flavor: "Houve um estalido de galhos, um farfalhar de folhas e depois um rugido terrível. Nosso grupo não tinha chance conforme a morte descia." — Taseen, bardo elfo

foreignNames.name: Скалолаз Каву
foreignNames.text: Когда Скалолаз Каву входит в игру, возьмите карту.
foreignNames.flavor: "Послышался хруст веток, шорох листьев, а затем ужасный рев. У нас не было шансов спастись: смерть пришла сверху". — Тасеен, эльфийский бард

foreignNames.name: 攀爬卡甫
foreignNames.text: 当攀爬卡甫进场时，抓一张牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 「几根树枝断裂，树叶飒飒作响，接着一声震天狂吼。 当死亡从天而降，我们一行人毫无机会逃离。」 ～地精吟游诗人塔欣

originalText: When Kavu Climber comes into play, draw a card.

name: Llanowar Elves
text: {T}: Add {G}.
flavor:
One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot.
—Llanowar penalty for trespassing

foreignNames.name: Llanowarelfen
foreignNames.text: {T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {G}.
foreignNames.flavor: Ein gebrochener Knochen für jeden zertretenen Zweig. —Strafe der Llanowar für Waldfriedensbruch

foreignNames.name: Elfos de Llanowar
foreignNames.text: {T}: Agrega {G} a tu reserva de maná.
foreignNames.flavor: Un hueso roto por cada rama partida. —Castigo llanowar a los intrusos

foreignNames.name: Elfes de Llanowar
foreignNames.text: {T} : Ajoutez {G} à votre réserve.
foreignNames.flavor: Un os brisé pour chaque branche cassée. —Punition de Llanowar pour les intrus

foreignNames.name: Elfi di Llanowar
foreignNames.text: {T}: Aggiungi {G} alla tua riserva di mana.
foreignNames.flavor: Un osso rotto per ogni ramoscello calpestato. —Punizione di Llanowar per gli intrusi

foreignNames.name: ラノワールのエルフ
foreignNames.text: {T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{G}を加える。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エルフ・ドルイド
foreignNames.flavor: 小枝を踏み折れば、骨を折ってあがないとする。 ――ラノワールのエルフの、侵入者への処罰

foreignNames.name: Elfos de Llanowar
foreignNames.text: {T}: Adicione {G} à sua reserva de mana.
foreignNames.flavor: Um osso quebrado para cada broto de planta espezinhado. — Pena por invasão em Llanowar

foreignNames.name: Лановарские Эльфы
foreignNames.text: {T}: Добавьте {G} в ваше хранилище маны.
foreignNames.flavor: Сломать одну кость за каждую веточку, хрустнувшую под ногами. — Лановарское наказание за нарушение границ

foreignNames.name: 罗堰地精
foreignNames.text: {T}：加{G}到你的法术力池中。
foreignNames.flavor: 每踩断脚下一根树枝就打断一根骨头。 ～罗堰族对非法入侵者的罚则

originalText: {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

name: Llanowar Sentinel
text: When Llanowar Sentinel enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, search your library for a card named Llanowar Sentinel, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
flavor:
"The forest has as many eyes as leaves."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

rulings.text: Because the “search” requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don’t have to find the card if you don’t want to.

Llanowar Sentinels can “chain”: If you put a second Llanowar Sentinel onto the battlefield as a result of this ability, that creature’s enters-the-battlefield ability triggers and allows you to search for yet another Llanowar Sentinel.

foreignNames.name: Llanowarwächter
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Llanowarwächter ins Spiel kommt, kannst du {1}{G} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Karte namens Llanowarwächter und bringe diese Karte ins Spiel. Mische danach deine Bibliothek.
foreignNames.flavor: „Der Wald hat ebensoviele Augen wie Blätter." —Mirri von der Wetterlicht

foreignNames.name: Centinela de Llanowar
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Centinela de Llanowar entre en juego, puedes pagar {1}{G}. Si lo haces, busca en tu biblioteca una carta llamada Centinela de Llanowar y ponla en juego. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: "El bosque tiene tantos ojos como hojas." —Mirri del Vientoligero

foreignNames.name: Sentinelle de Llanowar
foreignNames.text: Quand la Sentinelle de Llanowar arrive en jeu, vous pouvez payer {1}{G}. Si vous faites ainsi, cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte appelée Sentinelle de Llanowar et mettez-la en jeu. Mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: « La forêt a autant d'yeux que de feuilles. » —Mirri de l'Aquilon

foreignNames.name: Sentinella di Llanowar
foreignNames.text: Quando la Sentinella di Llanowar entra in gioco, puoi pagare {1}{G}. Se lo fai, passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta chiamata Sentinella di Llanowar e mettila in gioco. Poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: "La foresta ha un occhio per ogni foglia." —Mirri della Cavalcavento

foreignNames.name: ラノワールの歩哨
foreignNames.text: ラノワールの歩哨が場に出たとき、あなたは{1}{G}を支払ってもよい。 そうした場合、あなたのライブラリーから「ラノワールの歩哨」という名前のカードを１枚探し、そのカードを場に出す。 その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — エルフ
foreignNames.flavor: 森には葉っぱって名前の目がいっぱいあるわ。 ――ウェザーライト号のミリー

foreignNames.name: Sentinela de Llanowar
foreignNames.text: Quando Sentinela de Llanowar entra em jogo, você pode pagar {1}{G}. Se fizer isso, procure em seu grimório por um card cujo nome seja Sentinela de Llanowar e coloque aquele card em jogo. Depois, embaralhe seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: "A Floresta tem tantos olhos quanto folhas." — Mirri dos Bons Ventos

foreignNames.name: Лановарский Часовой

name: Lure
text:
Enchant creature
All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so.
flavor: Her true theft was to steal the soldiers away from their posts.

rulings.text: Lure doesn’t give any creatures the ability to block the target creature. It just forces those creatures that are already able to block the creature to do so.

As blockers are declared, any creature that’s tapped or affected by a spell or ability that says it can’t block doesn’t block. If there’s a cost associated with having the creature block, no player is forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t block if that cost isn’t paid.

name: Rhox
text:
You may have Rhox assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

rulings.text: You can decide to assign damage to the defending player or planeswalker even if the blocking creature has protection from green or damage preventing effects on it.

When assigning combat damage, you choose whether you want to assign all damage to blocking creatures, or if you want to assign all of it to the player or planeswalker this creature is attacking. You can’t split the damage assignment between them.
If blocked by a creature with banding, the defending player decides whether or not the damage is assigned “as though it weren’t blocked”.
